headline: B of A Securities Downgrades ConocoPhillips (COP)
Energy ETFs in Spotlight as US Natural Gas Prices Set to Fall This Year
summary: Energy ETFs like XLE come into focus as EIA forecasts a 2026 US natural gas price dip, followed by a sharp rebound expected in 2027.

headline: BofA shifts energy ratings for 2026: COP cut, MGY upgraded
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America has adjusted its ratings for some U.S. oil and gas stocks for 2026, turning more selective on oil exposure and downgrading several names while reaffirming conviction in others.
